system.description: • Children of the Night: Ancient vampires have the ability to summon and control wolves or rats. This requires an action and a @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor01charac.JournalEntryPage.01traits00000000]{Smarts} roll at −2. If successful, [[1d6]] # Wolves summoned wolves or [[1d6]] # Swarms of rats summoned swarms of rats (see @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-bestiary.Swarm]{Swarm}) come from the surrounding wilds in [[1d6+2]] # Rounds until summoned rounds.
